request.description:
capture the x-fusion-query-id
eg: x-fusion-query-id: GrkozUSzi4

page scroll, right click:new page,...
NOTE: these all assume the UI/front-end javascript captures these events, these calls only receive those signals sent from the UI

exec: console.info("Get from env fq_id : " + fq_id + " --- Q from pre-request: " + currentQry + " --- doc5id:" + doc5id  + " --- doc6id:" + doc6id  + " --- doc7id:" + doc7id );

body.raw:
[
    {
        "type": "click",
        "params": {
            "docId": "{{doc5id}}",
            "count": 5,
            "source": "postman test",
            "note": "postman test script: Add basic signal",
            "collection": "{{coll}}",
            "query": "{{currentQry}}",
            "fusion-query-id": "{{fq_id}}",
            "BU":"hybrid cloud",
            "Category": "solutions",
            "SubCategory": "virtualization",
            "testData": "true",
            "filterQueries": []
        }
    },
        {
        "type": "click",
        "params": {
            "docId": "{{doc6id}}",
            "count": 6,
            "source": "postman test",
            "note": "postman test script: Add basic signal",
            "collection": "{{coll}}",
            "query": "{{currentQry}}",
            "fusion-query-id": "{{fq_id}}",
            "BU":"hybrid cloud",
            "Category": "solutions",
            "SubCategory": "virtualization",
            "testData": "true",
            "filterQueries": []
        }
    },
    {
        "type": "click",
        "BU":"hybrid cloud -- put in 'params' section or this gets dropped",
        "Category": "solutions -- put in 'params' section or this gets dropped",
        "SubCategory": "virtualization -- put in 'params' section or this gets dropped",
        "params": {
            "docId": "{{doc7id}}",
            "count": 7,
            "source": "postman test",
            "note": "postman test script: putting params one level up ---NOTE: this won't work as desired missing BU, cat, subcat above",
            "collection": "{{coll}}",
            "query": "{{currentQry}}",
            "fusion-query-id": "{{fq_id}}",
            "testData": "true",
            "filterQueries": []
        }
    }
]
